file_content.text: I won't let Kesler rot in some Imperial prison.
I've got Kesler's report.
Then... Kesler's alive? And this data--thank you.
I'll have our people go over his findings at once. Then I'll see about getting him back.
Head to Shadow Town. Find Kesler and his report.
Excuse me. Agent Alys, SIS. I came to Shadow Town looking for someone. Goes by Kesler. He's--he was my partner.
He was undercover, investigating the Labor Alliance's operations on Nar Shaddaa.
Two weeks ago he contacted me, said he'd been compromised. Promised he'd transmit his report, but... nothing. Now he's MIA.
Snooping on slavers is dangerous business.
That's a gutsy assignment.
Everything we do is dangerous.
He's been captured?
I--yes. Kesler is one of our top agents. He wouldn't go this long without reporting in.
What kind of information was in Kesler's report?
What was he investigating?
Names, places, accounts of goods delivered and received. Inside info on the Labor Alliance's dealings with the Empire.
Kesler knew his cover was blown, but he didn't hit any of our drop points. Which means he may still have his report.
We've got a massive sting operation in the works. Its success hinges on Kesler's findings. We need someone to bring back that report.
You don't want to free Kesler?
What about your partner?
Of course I--look, if Kesler is alive inside that place, it means cranial bombs. No easy escape.
Leave it to me.
I--thank you.
Just see if he's in Shadow Town, and bring back his report if you find him.
And please... let him know I haven't forgotten about him. I will come for him.
Not me. [Refuse quest]
It was a long shot anyway....
Blasted fool. Should've gotten out when he had the chance.
